attributes.action: Protect us from inadequate infrastructure and speculative housing development!
attributes.additional_details: Gov’t unambiguously demands "sustainable" development in NPPF; its demand for decentralisation & localism are in disrepute & is  clearly not working for the people. In the short term it should quash suppression of local planning policy where there is no 5yr land supply especially where serious infrastructure issues are also evident. NPPF para 47.2 should define how land is acquired; Current mechanism is not working for our communities leaving us open to speculative & unsustainable development!
attributes.background: Did you know.... the Government WILL reverse local planning refusals irrespective of poor infrastructure if a 5 year land supply is not evident? This is clearly WRONG! Time is running out! Sprawling and “unsustainable” urbanisation will result! We must have LOCAL DECISIONS made by LOCAL PEOPLE!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking for a specific change to the NPPF.
